statements: UPDATE iot_products SET inventory_level = 50 WHERE product_id = 123;

UPDATE locations SET products_in_stock = 50, location_address = '123 Main Street' WHERE location_id = 200
UPDATE products SET quantity = 10, last_updated = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE locations SET capacity = 100, products_in_stock = 50, location_address = '123 Main Street' WHERE location_id = 3;

UPDATE product_history SET description='Updated product info', action_type='Update', action_date='2023-05-12 14:30:00' WHERE product_id='3f4ad8f0-631c-4f3e-b21d-bd63DB7a1b9e';
UPDATE product_inventory SET quantity = 1000, location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE product_code = 'ABC123';

UPDATE products SET price = 25.99, quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 1002;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 100, last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE inventory_id = 2001;
UPDATE products SET price = price + 10 WHERE product_id = 100;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 5, last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE product_id = 200 AND warehouse_id = 1;

UPDATE product_categories SET description = 'New Description' WHERE category_name = 'Category B';
